1.content:
Thanks for entering. Welcome to the wonderful world of the Disney collection, before diving into the story choose between the two characters as well as a few other descriptions.

Jay and Katie:
They are both sixteen year old with brown hair. They are introverted and have grown up with a lot of Disney properties. They have a decent sized family (You can choose who is in their family as your stories go on.) You can decide on Jay and Katie’s behaviour towards the shrunken Disney character, gentle wanting them to be their friend/pet/girlfriend, mean or not really caring as they just want to have them as a sex toy/doll. It’s up to you.

The Device:
The Device that Jay or Katie find is an IPad that has a library of Disney characters on it as well as a built in size device. How the device works is that the characters can cycle through the Disney character selection library, once they find they character they can select the character and insert a size for them to be once they enter the real world. Six inches, one foot, one inch and to bring them as their normal size there is a normal sized button (Creative, I know). Once selected a green button appears and once that is pressed the character will be brought in the real world in their natural form. To shrink someone in the real world you can go straight you the size options and just select a size, aim it at the subject and press the green button.

So lets jump into the story, who should we follow?
1.title: Welcome to the Disney Collection

Jay comes home from a long day at school. It’s a Friday so Jay is looking forward to the weekend, the week has drained him and he is ready to enjoy his weekend. He briefly looked past as he walked in but didn’t take a second look or pay to much attention to it. Jay climbs off his bed and heads to his desk.

“What the fuck?” Jay gasps.

There is a IPad laying on his desk. It’s not Jay’s but it looks like a gift. There is a sticky note on it saying enjoy with a smily face on it. Jay is confused. The handwriting doesn’t look like his Mom or Dad’s or even anyone in his family. Jay picks it up and gives it and looks at it. It looks like a normal IPad.

“Awesome,” Jay smiles. “Free IPad.”

Jay sits at his desk and press the home button to turn it on. It doesn’t have the standard home screen, what appears is the Disney logo followed by text saying “Welcome to the Disney Shrink Collection” Jay is confused by this. He presses the enter button and a brief description of what the device is. The description explains that the user can select a Disney character to bring into the real world, normal sized or shrunk at any size as well as shrinking other. Jay can’t help but laugh, this sounds so insane but amazing at the same time.

“This can’t be real.” Jay smiles.

Jay doesn’t believe that this is real but at the same time he wants it to be real. The possibility of having is own Disney character would be incredible. Jay enters the app and finds all sorts of categories. Jay thinks long and hard on what category he wants to select. If this is real he needs to choose someone worth his time.

What category does Jay choose?

info.brief_description: Jay or Katie get a device that allows them to shrink Disney characters.
info.description:
Welcome to the wonderful world of the Great Disney Shrink Collection where you get to choose between Jay or Katie as they discover a device that allows them to bring a Disney character into the real world. Decide and write as they bring a Disney character into the real world as the size of a doll or as normal sized. Maybe you would like Jay or Katie to bring in multiple characters with multiple sizes. Have one be their girlfriend, maybe just a sex toy for them or even a pet for them. Share them with their friends, family. The possibilities are endless! Let your imagination run free as you get to decide what will happen! All sizes welcome! Six inches, four inches, one inch or even a couple of feet, you can even make them normal sized. You can grow them if you like.


Rules:
1. Disney characters only! (That means characters only under the Disney banner, Marvel, Star Wars, animated films, TV Shows including the ABC Network, cartoon, anything under the Disney banner, Update: I'm allowing 20th Century Fox Characters to be included.) I will allow Disney actors as well as video-games.

2. Make sure it’s consistent with the pervious chapter. You are allowed to change things from the previous chapter just make sure you explain it and make it consistent.

3. Besides options chapters I’d prefer to have a chapter be at least a couple of sentences long, a paragraph at the minimum.

4. If you are intending to have any sexual interactions with characters please avoid very young characters. Pre Teen is fine just don’t do anything sexual with any characters under that age. You are welcome to introduce them and make them play with the Disney character just make sure the sexual activity isn’t involving the younger character.

5. You are welcome to reserve chapters, all I ask is that you be respectful and don’t add to someone’s reserved chapter.

6. Let your imagination run wild. I don’t have anything else you can’t do, everything is welcome! Just follow the rules and you should be fine.

7. No spamming or having endless option chapters that lead no where, the point of the interactive is to create stories not make it a option interactive. I will delete chapters like this if it happens.


You are welcome you add male characters if you would like, any scenario is welcome, Jay or Katie shrinks with the Disney character, the Disney character grows to normal size and plays with the main character as well as playing with another shrunken Disney character. Jay or Katie sharing their Disney character with a friend or family member or just leaving them in their hands and having the story focus on them. You can even shrink Jay or Katie’s friends or family if you would like. Anything goes! I won’t delete chapters unless I really have to.


Any questions feel free to send me an email



Special thanks and assisted by Lonly Wanderer, thank you so much for your help, you deserve some of the credit 😊
